title: ENCODE RNAi
description: Schema for submitting an ENCODE RNAi (including shRNA and siRNA)

schema-version.description: The version of JSON schema files used in the generation of the example
schema-version.comment: Must match the specific schemas' `version` property

rnai_type.description: The sub-type of the interfering RNA
rnai_type.title: RNAi Type

source.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an ENCODE source UUID or unique Source name
source.title: Construct Source

product_url.description: External Product URL for the specific construct at vendor site
product_url.title: Product URL

target.description: Target that knocked down or inhibited by the RNAi
target.comment: Automatic submitters can supply a target uuid, or name/species pair
target.title: RNAi Target

vector_backbone_name.description: The name of the vector backone used for the RNAi construct
vector_backbone_name.title: Vector Backbone Name

documents.description: List of documents associated with this RNAi
documents.comment: For automatic submission supply unique documents names or uuids
documents.title: RNAi Documents (list)

validations.description: List of documents/images associated with the validation of this RNAi
validations.comment: For automatic submission supply unique documents/images names or uuids
validations.title: RNAi Validation Images (list)

rnai_sequence.description: Sequence for the relevant part of the inhibatory RNA(not including vector)
rnai_sequence.title: RNAi Sequence

rnai_target_sequence.description: Genomic sequence of the target of the RNAi
rnai_target_sequence.title: Target Sequence
